name: Rajath Kumar
tweet: Pioli says Milan weren’t inferior to Juventus last night. I wonder when he’ll face a strong line of questioning with hard facts and stats. Otherwise, he sings the same song in every post match interview and walks away without bother. This attitude shows on the pitch as well.

comments.name: Dr. R.S.T.
comments.tweet: He needs to be sacked imo. An aura of stagnation has crept in. He was indeed great when he came in. Pulled us out of the banter era with the limited resources he was provided. It’s time to get a proper tactician and to get rid of some of the “great” players we have.
